actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 2015 15th Street in Gulfport, Mississippi, as the "Judge Dan M. Russell, Jr. Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building and U.S. courthouse located at 2015 15th Street in Gulfport, Mississippi, as the Judge Dan M. Russell, Jr. Federal Building and United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 2015 15th Street in Gulfport, Mississippi, as the "Judge Dan M. Russell, Jr. Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
